backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Testimonial type and Map-based storage with functions to add, retrieve by ID, and get all testimonials.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a change to increase font size and dimensions of the Gmail contact card in ContactSection.tsx while ensuring single-line email display.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of all frontend component files describing their UI elements, animations, and styling features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors, borders, and sidebar styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for SwiftOps Automation app with root div, main.tsx script, and embedded Jotform agent script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component rendering Navbar, all page sections (Hero, Services, Stats, HowItWorks, Integrations, EliteClientProfiles, AIPerformance, FinalCTA, Contact), Footer, and NeonCursor.
frontend/src/components/AIPerformanceSec: Section displaying AI performance metrics with animated counters, a testimonial quote, and a workflow visualization image with animated pulse nodes.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with glassmorphism cards displaying name, phone, WhatsApp (green glow), Instagram, and email with responsive font sizing (text-sm/base/lg), whitespace-nowrap, and ellipsis overflow handling for single-line display.
frontend/src/components/EagleClickAnimat: Full-screen eagle logo animation component with staged sequence including fade, draw, expand, particles, pulse, scale, and fadeout effects triggered on CTA button clicks.
frontend/src/components/EagleLogo.tsx: React component that renders an animated eagle logo with neon glow effects, hover interactions, and a one-time fade-in animation tracked via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/EliteClientProfi: Displays a grid of three client testimonial cards with profile images, names, positions, and quotes, using intersection observer for fade-in animations.
Final call-to-action section with email input form and submit button featuring ripple effects and neon styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with company branding, multi-column link sections, social media icons, contact info, and copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with parallax background, animated eagle logo, floating particles, headline text, and CTA buttons that trigger eagle click animations and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Three-step process section with icons (Connect, Deploy, Automate) displayed in cards with animated entrance effects and connecting line.
frontend/src/components/IntegrationsSect: Displays an infinite horizontal scrolling marquee of integration partner names with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar component with logo, desktop/mobile menus, scroll effects, and animated section navigation using eagle click animations and ripple effects.
frontend/src/components/NeonCursor.tsx: Custom cursor component that displays a neon glow effect following the mouse position on desktop devices only.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Empty file for pricing section component (not yet implemented).
Services section displaying six service cards (AI Agents, Chatbots, Email Automation, Workflow Automation, Website/App Development) with icons, descriptions, and fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/StatsSection.tsx: Statistics section showing four animated counters (tasks automated, integrations, uptime, clients) with neon styling and intersection-based triggering.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Empty file for testimonials section component (not yet implemented).
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Hook that tracks which section is currently visible in the viewport using IntersectionObserver to highlight active navigation links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCounterAnimation.t: Hook that animates a number from 0 to a target value over a specified duration using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionObserv: Hook that returns whether a referenced element is currently intersecting the viewport using IntersectionObserver API.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Hook that calculates parallax scroll offset based on window scroll position and a configurable speed multiplier.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for React Query hooks that would interact with the backend (currently unused).
frontend/src/hooks/useRippleEffect.ts: Hook that creates a Material Design-style ripple animation effect on click events by dynamically adding and removing DOM elements.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports fonts (Orbitron, Inter), configures Tailwind CSS, defines CSS custom properties for theming, and provides utility classes for neon/cyberpunk styling including glowing buttons, text effects, and color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers, mounting to the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (neon-cyan, dark-bg, etc.), font families (Orbitron, Inter), border radius variables, and animations for accordion components with required plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking an existing feature to increase Gmail contact card dimensions while preventing email text wrapping, with one pending feature request (AR-1) for the same goal.
